name: Button Music
description:
Feel yourself a composer!
In Button Music you can compose your unique melody!

Features
  • Assign to the buttons sounds from the list
  • Using the scrollbar, change the tone of the sound
  • Using the keyboard as a launcher, play your melody!

Show yourself!
You have a unique opportunity to add sounds yourself!
  • Find the folder Audio in the project directory.
  • Drag and drop your sound into the Audio folder
  • Your sound is displayed in the application list
